title: Photo Of The Day: October 16, 2008
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: It's finally feeling like fall outside, and this green leaf is one sight we won't be seeing for much longer. Thanks to Grey Street Girl for the
contentEncoded:
It’s finally feeling like fall outside, and this green leaf is one sight we won’t be seeing for much longer. Thanks to Grey Street Girl for the submission.

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
